title: Elegant resorts
content: I'd appreciate some feedback on the proposed redraw of the logo for this UK based tour operator which specialises in luxury holidays. There is a feeling that the current logo, which is some 12 years old, is in need of a fresher look. ![Elegant Resorts current logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013132656im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/34568.gif) Does the revised design achieve this? ![Elegant Resorts new logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013132656im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/34569.gif)
author: goffey
